reviewText: Like the movie. saw it on tv. WHY THE HELL IS IT SOOOO DAMN EXPENSIVE?
This is a great remake of A Christmas Carol but come on! $200 for a VHS????  Its on Hallmark Channels ~ PLEASE! Whoever can! Release it as a DVD! An AFFORDABLE DVD!!!!
HEARTWARMING CHRISTMAS SHOW!! WHOLESOME FAMILY MOVIE
It is a great movie! Unfortunately it is not in dvd form but glad I still have several vcr's that work

The movie is a 5 star, so why did I give it 1 star you ask? Read on please. I saw part of this movie on television years ago and fell in love with it. I surely would love to purchase it but not at the outrageous price listed above and certainly not on a vsh tape. Why oh Why is the movie not on dvd? Maybe the better question is when will Amazon release the movie on dvd?
The VHS worked very well. The end was a bit staticky but all was well. Gift for my mother. She loved it. Asked for but couldn't find it. Thank you

Why has this not been released on DVD?

It seems that every piece of reality TV garbage is immediately released on DVD.  Why can't movies such as this be released too?
I believe more could have been done with the plot at the end. Too superficial.
